amendment.description: To require a study of the mission of the 932nd Airlift Wing, Scott Air Force Base, Illinois.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1303 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1303 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9566) To require a study of the mission of the 932nd Airlift Wing, Scott Air Force Base, Illinois.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1303 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1303 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
